title: Apple Gift Card Product Manager
summary: The Apple Gift Card team is looking for a Product Manager to ideate and launch platform initiatives with a specific focus on risk management and compliance. This senior level individual contributor role will be responsible for key aspects of Apple Gift Card and Apple Account product integrity. You should combine a strong sense of user experience, industry knowledge, and analytical prowess. You should be able to simplify sophisticated concepts, articulate and explain your thoughts effectively, ask questions to gain insights and understand different points of view. You will be constantly learning new things across our organization, and you will demonstrate what you learn to find solutions that others cannot see.
description: Your primary focus will be on improving our robust fraud prevention platform, working closely with our cross-functional team of engineers, designers, and product managers. You'll be instrumental in: Redemption Step-up and ID Verification, Regulatory Compliance Preparedness, Thought Leadership in platform initiatives.
key_qualifications: 7+ years proven experience in designing and implementing scalable platform solutions is essential. 5+ years in the payments or financial services industry, with proven experience working on Fraud, Legal, or Compliance initiatives.
preferred_qualifications: Fraud Prevention Acumen: A passion for fraud prevention and a solid understanding of payment fraud methodologies are essential. Collaboration, Thought Leadership, Outstanding interpersonal skills, Confirmed experience working on sophisticated, international, large-scale, time-critical projects
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $165,500 and $293,800, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation.
